title: User-Friendly Interface
description: The user interface is thoughtfully designed for ease of use. It provides a clean and intuitive layout that allows users to input their calculations with convenience and efficiency.

title: Input Validation
description: I incorporated robust input validation to ensure that the calculator responds gracefully to user inputs. This minimizes errors and enhances the overall user experience.

title: Error Handling
description: To enhance user experience, I implemented error handling mechanisms, ensuring that the calculator provides clear and informative error messages for invalid inputs.

title: Code Efficiency
description: My code is optimized for efficiency, making the calculator responsive and capable of handling complex calculations without performance issues.
